Package 01

Kandy, the last capital of the Sinhala kings, today the most beautiful city in the island. Daladamaligawa- Temple of the sacred tooth relic of the lord Buddha and many temples with beautiful paintings and wood Carvings, royal botanical gardens & university at peradeniya, hydro-power reservoirs, udawattekele reserve, cultural shows (kandyan dancing) shopping (handicrafts, batiks, jems and jewellery) visit elephant orphanage and tea factory enroute

Package 02

The “gem city” of srilanka, gem pits (mining) gem workshops (gem cutting, polishing, jewellery making) ,bopathella waterfall, enroute visit Rubber estate & factory. A beautiful drive from colombo through typical sri Lankan villages.

Package 03

Day -1 leave for kandy. Visit elephant orphanage and a tea factory enroute .sightseeing in kandy. Overnight at kandy. Day -2 early morning, proceed to nuwaraeliyab through ramboda pass-beautiful scenery of the hill country- tea estates ramboda waterfall (329ft) N’eliya, 6182 ftabovesea level, is a replica of an old English village with cottage &victorian type buildings. Pidurutalagala (8281ft.) Highest peak in srilanka – hakgala botanical gardens- back to colombo through ginigathhena. May stop for lunch at kitulgala rest house. Kitugala was the location for the famous film “bridge on the river kwai”

Package 04

Day -1 early morning leave for Anuradhapura. The monuments date back to srimaha Bodhi the oldest historicaliy documented tree in the worldis found here. Proceed to habarana. Overnight at habarana. Day -2 morning drive back to colombo via kandy visiting sigiriya rock fortress enrouteproceed to colombo. If time permits visit elephant Orphanage at pinnawela.

Package 05

Day -1 morning leave for nuwaraeliya via kitulgala and talawakeke. Beautiful hill country scenery. Sightseeing in nuwaraeliya visit hakgala Botanical gardens. Dinner & night at nuwaraeliya Day -2 morning leave for kandy visiting a tea estate and factory enroute. Sightseeing and shopping in kandy. Dinner & night at kandy. Day -3 morning leave for sigiriya rock fortress. After lunch return to colombo via kurunegala.
